summary: Streamlit app running successfully - all dependencies fixed and BookInfo issue resolved
interaction_summary: Fixed all missing dependencies on EC2 and confirmed app runs with python -m streamlit run without traceback errors

dependencies_issue.root_cause: EC2 instance likely lost files due to ephemeral nature or different deployment methods
dependencies_issue.solution: Manually copied missing files from local development environment

verification_method.result: ✅ SUCCESS - No traceback errors, app URL displayed

recommendations.ec2_deployment: Consider using persistent storage (EBS) or automated deployment scripts to prevent file loss
recommendations.project_sync: Establish consistent deployment process between local and EC2 environments
recommendations.monitoring: Monitor EC2 instance for file system changes or unexpected restarts
